title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 811.2 - Designated waters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 811.2 - Designated waters

State Regulations

The designated waters are located in the Chemung River
drainage basin within New York State, excluding Newtown Creek drainage basin, as outlined in Map 1, section
811.7, infra., and as contained
within the topographical limit shown on the reproduced typographical reference
maps set forth in section
811.9, infra. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
811.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
